name: jared
text:
I can not see a toyota pick-up truck without thinking about this comic strip.
You know a strip is good when it changes your perception of the world.

name: saint
text: achewood will do that to you.

name: rainwolfj
text:
Achewood will do that FOR you. It's a charitable gift and you should all respect it as such.

It's like enlightenment, but without the arrogance.

name: woodenteeth
text: I remember when I went to Thailand and thought, "All these monks are so arrogant ".

name: wazza
text: all with their bowls, just expecting people to feed them once a day

name: juancarlos
text: Not too many Toyota trucks, this seems like on of those instances of Beef channeling Onstad.

name: juancarlos
text: In Mexico, I mean.

name: zefiel
text: I just saw one the other day! Hey, do you think the 'OYO' stands for 'HOYO' and thus beef thinks what he thinks? I Can't make sense of this comic otherwise. Back me up, fellow spanish speaker!

name: juancarlos
text:
I think the weird ideas stem from the image of a primitive gringo ripping off letters from his van while trying to achieve some sort of sense of identity and manhood.

You saw one? Goes to prove again my theory that Cuautitlan izcalli is a weird place.

No Oyo's in Chilangoland.

name: zefiel
text:
I agree, I've been living in the DF for a while (attend college in CU) and no OYOS around here

..wait, wait, how do you know I'm from Izcalli? are you like Japan Man?

name: junko
text: Ive seen a bunch of these in the Midwest.

name: rowboat
text: The version I've seen most often, also in the Midwest, is "YOTA," which is almost awesome.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i'd do either 'toy' or 'yo'...'cos i think that's rad.

name: stuart
text: 'YO', was, in fact, in TOY Story.

name: pr0ncess
text: I think it's meant to be a cock and balls... but the cock is so small dude, so small.

name: jlaw
text: i have aways thought it was supposed to be a crude representation of breasts, I remember kids at my school would write things like that that only looked very very vaguely like breasts because they had weird ideas about what it meant to be a man

name: 7th_shot
text: See, I'd never seen this done before Achewood mentioned it because I don't live close enough to the Midwest. Not that I'm complaining. Anyway, most I'm just seconding the notion that it's supposed to be boobies and cleavage.

name: tripperday
text: It is a woman sitting down, from the waist down, and her legs have been amputated above the knee. She is facing you. (And knows you lied.)

name: ted0phile
text: Jesus Christ.

name: norsef
text: This is pretty much a perfect comment.

name: carlyle
text: She looks at you knowing full well you are a man who would shoot a baby.

name: imitationcrab
text: I saw one that said "TOY" once

name: tekende
text: That's pretty accurate.

name: boredom_man
text: It's certainly comprehensible.

name: unsentletter
text: I've seen that a few times too.

name: luke_johnson
text: I think OYO depicts breasts.

name: cleave
text: A comment left by cleave was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, SaintTim, HeyMan, empy, Direhaggis, Mastronaut)

name: pogo
text: DOn't you mean "bazoombas"?  I thought a bozack was a dick here in Achewood.

name: unityrolf
text: I have always assumed it was slangified "ballsack."

name: carlyle
text: Don'y you mean gazungas ?

name: rykan
text:
Same for me, fella.

( o Y o )

name: sarabria
text: i like how whenever beef is about to have a tangential thought there is the big gathering of the thought balloon.

name: varnish
text: A friend of mine did this to his truck. He also wanted to get one of those truck nut things, and I had to explain to him the image that would create. My friends are terrible people.

name: ferdinand
text: a friend of mine changed his Jetta TDI to say JEDI.  my friends are awesome people.

name: lunchbox
text: this needs to be a bumper sticker

name: philosophe
text:
Escalade EXT

becomes

Sexcalade

name: alarumba
text: Do any humans still drive or have cats taken over?

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Molly: Butte on FoodStation...

name: sarmatron
text: It's clearly an owl.

name: sp1derbaby
text: That's the excuse I thought of if my boss caught me sneaking those characters into our unit tests.

name: dasuta
text: It could be a shortening of boyo.  He could be irish.

name: andyfaewatford
text: The word I think you were looking for was 'Welsh'.

name: i_love_kate
text: ...No, no, I'm quite familiar with "boyo" as an Irish term of endearment/patronisation.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Right y'are, boyo.

name: pogo
text: "YO" is the most common, meaning "I" or "me" in Spanish.

name: mangtastic
text: I always thought it was the preterit he/she/you (formal) conjugation for oir (to hear), minus the accent on the second o.

name: kaithekender
text: I've never seen this and I refuse to believe anyone can be bored enough to actually do it.

name: twells
text: "OYO" looks like cock and balls aha :D

name: lolsworth
text: Maybe he's saying "ta-ta"

name: phbauer2004
text: Mammary intercourse, of course
